message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $110?
I understand that $150 is a bit high for you, but I have to make a profit. I can do $130, which is a good compromise. I think you'll find it's worth it.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $130 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm not quite there yet. I can do $125, which is a fair price considering the value this product brings. I think you'll be happy with it.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $115?
I'm not willing to go below $125, that's my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll do $122.50. That's the best I can do.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $115 again?
